title: Ongoing accounting help with startup business
snippet:
I need a book keeper to assist with the lodgement of BAS statements (including GST), collecting receipts from me electronically, and and ensuring that I am following the best practices of claiming expenses to get the best tax return. 
I'm running a video and social media business. 

I am only just starting this business so not a lot of transactions to start with, probably only 2-4 hours per month right now but this will be an ongoing gig, and the company will grow. 

I am a low maintenance client but I do need someone external to hold me accountable and guide me to getting my tax BAS statement paperwork in check and maintaining it as our business grows.
